sub_title: CEO & Co-Founder Ritmoo | Catalyst for Growth & Leadership Wisdom ⚡️ LinkedIn Top Team Management Voice
summary:
A seasoned growth leader, catalyst for change, and co-founder of Ritmoo—a platform redefining collaborative decision-making. I have been at the forefront of scaling several companies, most notably as the former Chief Growth Officer at EVBox, where I contributed to exponential growth—from a team of 10 to 700, driving revenue from 6 to 9 figures.

My journey & highlights: 

⚡️ Co-founder & CEO of Ritmoo, collaborative decision-making platform (https://ritmoo.io)
⚡️ Founder Baking Growth's growth advisory firm (clients include ING, IECharge, Dott, CLEVR)
⚡️ Former Chief Growth Officer at EVBox (10 to 700 people / 6 to 9 digit revenue figures)
⚡️ Former Head of Growth at Talentsquare (exit in 2015)
⚡️ Former Global President of AIESEC 
⚡️ Angel Investor & LP (Stolp, Pal, Shilling VC)
⚡️ Speaker at Inbound, Dreamforce, DMWF, The Next Web, The Shift
⚡️ Podcast guest on Breakout Growth, REVOLUTION, Candid Growth Chats, Climate Action 
⚡️ Awarded World's Most Connected Person on Facebook by Western Union (2011)
⚡️ Graduated in Business Administration & Org Psychology (Lisbon)
⚡️ Graduated at altMBA
⚡️ Former professional table tennis player
⚡️ Married to a lovely & empowering wife
⚡️ Dad of a daughter born with the most durable Duracell batteries ever

I passionately share insights about growth leadership and scaling up here on LinkedIn and through my newsletter, Scaling With Hugo. You can also find free resources on my website, scalingwithhugo.com.
